sections.title: Introduction
sections.summary: What these rules cover, why you should read them and definitions of some of the terms we use.

sections.title: What is an apprenticeship?
sections.summary: What employers, providers and apprentices should expect from an apprenticeship. Includes information about contracts, pay and training.

sections.title: Who can be funded?
sections.summary: How to work out if an individual is eligible for apprenticeship funding. Includes information on additional financial support for learners with learning difficulties.

sections.title: Which costs are funded?
sections.summary: Which costs can and cannot be paid for with apprenticeship funds. Includes information on: support for care leavers, end-point assessments and English and maths training.

sections.title: Contracting and subcontracting
sections.summary: The responsibilities of employer-providers and their subcontractors. Includes information on subcontracting to providers who are not on the Register of Approved Training Providers (RoATP).

sections.title: Paying for an apprenticeship
sections.summary: When providers will receive payments, reporting requirements and agreeing a price. Includes information on accounting for prior learning, employer contributions (co-investment) and VAT.

sections.title: Apprenticeships funded by transfers of levy funds
sections.summary: Information on sending and receiving (transferring) apprenticeship levy funds.

sections.title: Delivering the apprenticeship
sections.summary: Information on data protection and apprenticeship completion certificates.

sections.title: Changes in circumstances
sections.summary: Information on changes of provider and changes in an apprenticeâ€™s personal or employment circumstances (including breaks in learning). Explains what effect (if any) there is on apprenticeship funding following a change in circumstances.

sections.title: Evidence requirements
sections.summary: A list of the evidence that must be held and maintained for each apprenticeship.

sections.title: Annex A: Eligibility criteria (who we fund)
sections.summary: Information on who may be eligible for apprenticeship funding. Includes residency, citizenship and age criteria.

sections.title: Glossary
sections.summary: Definitions of the terms we use.
